segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a total mess with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over like some sloppy flood in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, drying a plate without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's soaked, and the puddle's spreading disgustingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids rummaging in the cookie jar, gross with sticky hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing on that rickety stool, crumbs falling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, probably covered in who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water dripping down the cabinets, staining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole place is turning into a soggy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nice garden view can't hide the indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness with the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in an open jar, inviting ants or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
